imdb.plot outline: 2 kids dropped blindfolded somewhere in the Netherlanda and need to find their way home/ back to school. During their trip they have to solve puzzels and do asseignments which are all connected to the location. All about geography, local history and / or nature. With that they can earn transport / vehicles to get home faster. And that's important, because the clock is ticking....
imdb.title: DropZone
plot: 2 kids dropped blindfolded somewhere in the Netherlanda and need to find their way home/ back to school. During their trip they have to solve puzzels and do asseignments which are all connected to the location. All about geography, local history and / or nature. With that they can earn transport / vehicles to get home faster. And that's important, because the clock is ticking....::Joyce Donat
